extendedInfo.description: Take your Web meetings anywhere.It's easy to stay connected to important meetings, wherever you are.With Cisco WebEx, you can join any web conference right from your Android tablet or smartphone.Cisco WebEx Meetings for Android works with Cisco WebEx Meeting Center, Cisco WebEx Training Center and Cisco WebEx Meetings to deliver mobile web conferencing, audio, and high quality video. Meet anywhere, with anyone, and get more done. Join, Start or Schedule Cisco WebEx Meetings from your Android device.This latest release introduces support for WebEx Enabled TelePresence 2.0 and Network Based Recording support.**** Please note: We are aware of an existing issue launching into WebEx meetings with Chrome. We are looking to resolve this issue as soon as possible. In the meantime please use an alternate browser (Firefox, Dolphin, Opera, etc.). Read more here: http://kb.webex.com/WBX71436 ****Learn more at http://www.webex.com.Experience Cisco WebEx High Quality 2-way video on Android Tablets and Smartphones, such as the Nexus 7 from Google and the Galaxy SIII from Samsung, by viewing the video feeds of the participants in the web conference and streaming your own video back to them. Use video to engage and collaborate. Whether you're holding a brainstorming session or making a presentation, turning your online meeting into a virtual video conference helps everyone focus on every word. The two-way streaming video on Android Tablets delivers an unparalleled visual experience on the go.Getting face-to-face has never been easier!Features:Mobile video conferencing:â¢High-quality, multipoint videoâ¢2-way video with camera switcherâ¢Voice-activated video switchingâ¢Full-screen videoâ¢View content and video simultaneouslyâ¢WebEx Enabled TelePresence 2.0 SupportHost account capabilities, including:â¢Schedule, start, and cancel a meetingâ¢Start/Pause recordingsâ¢Invite others to a meetingâ¢Pass presenter capabilities to another participantMeeting Capabilities:â¢Join via Cisco WebEx meeting email invite, meeting number, Cisco WebEx site URL, or My Meetings Listâ¢Integrated VoIP audio and web conferencing on Wi-Fi and 3G/4Gâ¢Full-screen meeting viewâ¢View attendee listâ¢View shared content with annotationsâ¢Pinch to zoom and scanâ¢Private or group chatGlobal and Enterprise Ready:â¢You can now sign in to Cisco WebEx via your corporate account (for sites with Single Sign-On, or SSO, enabled) â¢End-to-end encryption supportâ¢Available in 13 languagesHave more questions about Cisco WebEx Meetings for Android? Visit:http://www.webex.com/products/web-conferencing/mobile-android-faq.htmlNeed technical support or help using Cisco WebEx Meetings for Android? Visit:http://support.webex.com/supportREQUIREMENTSAndroid OS 2.3 and higher is required for VoIP functionality.In general, all the latest Android smartphones (OS 4.0+) and tablets (OS3.0+) will support Cisco WebEx 2-way video. This includes the Google Nexus 10".Dual-core CPU is required to send/receive video.The following phones and tablets have been tested and optimized for Cisco WebEx 2-way video:â¢ Cisco DX-650â¢ Google Nexus 4", 7â, 10"â¢ Amazon Kindle Fire based on Android 4.xâ¢ Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7â, 8.9"â¢ Fujitsu Arrows Tabâ¢ Motorola Xyboard 8.2â, 10.1ââ¢ Samsung Galaxy S4, S3, 7.7", 8.9â, 10.1"â¢ Samsung Note 2, 8â¢ Sony Tablet S 9.4"â¢ Motorola Razr XT928â¢ HTC One XCisco WebEx service is not available in all countries - please see www.webex.com for more information.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Just like from desktop. Haven\'t tested voice or camera, just viewing
reviews.author: Kairyl Ikbal

reviews.title: I think it is good.
reviews.comment: Its my first time ..
reviews.author: Jenette Castro

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: A player for recorded files is a must with this app.
reviews.author: Chandan Tripathi

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Helped me a lot
reviews.author: Deepak Saini

reviews.title: Gooood
reviews.comment: Hi app WebEx very good
reviews.author: amirhossein kermanshahei

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Like or
reviews.author: Tamirah Smith

reviews.title: can\'t connect to any of my meetings
reviews.comment: I always get \"Unable to connect to webex server\"
reviews.author: Peter Nam

reviews.title: WebEx is pretty good!
reviews.comment: Gives better performance on the mobile app then on my PC.
reviews.author: Badger Garner

reviews.comment: Webex for online meetings
reviews.author: vaddi devendranath

reviews.title: Missing crucial features
reviews.comment: As a daily Webex user via the PC I now tested this app on my Galaxy Note 2. One of the most important features is the fact that I cannot share files that exist on my phone,  why not?  Without this the app is useless
reviews.author: Martin de Bruin

reviews.title: Could be much better
reviews.comment: I host almost all of the webex meetings for my company and sometimes need to start a meeting from my android phone. There are a lot of key features that need to be added for me too give this api a great rating. I\'m not always required to stay on these calls, so it would be great if they allowed me to choose one person to be presenter and a separate person to be host. Also, why doesnt the host have the option to record to the webex server if using the mobile app?
reviews.author: Shadawn Lloyd

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on JellyBean
reviews.comment: Says I need to have android 2.1 or better. 2 diff phones (tmo gx2 and telus note2)
reviews.author: Ray Arsenault

reviews.title: Cannot use speakerphone
reviews.comment: The app does not have a provision to route the audio to the speaker. It is impossible to watch a screenshare and listen to them at the same time. How stupid.
reviews.author: Sreejith K

reviews.title: Really?!
reviews.comment: Is there a good reason why I have to use my minutes by calling in to hear the webinars? It can\'t be fixed where I can hear it in the app alone?
reviews.author: Kim D

reviews.title: Not working over 3G
reviews.comment: Tried to use this app over 3G doesn\'t connect to the network using jb422 and chrome.... Works fine over WiFi
reviews.author: Krishna Chaitanya

reviews.title: Formerly great app, now disappointing
reviews.comment: This app used to work great.  Suddenly it doesn\'t work for all Webex meeing types and suggests that you join the meeting from a computer.  The lack of predictable compatibility makes this app useless.  Time for an upgrade to the app??
reviews.author: Richard Leff

reviews.title: WTF?
reviews.comment: I want to say how i feel about this app but then I\'d be negative to the tenth degree. So to make it fair, the app is good to WATCH a meeting. Listening to a meeting is a whole other story in itself. Quite disappointed actually. I will be uninstalling this app and will not be using it on either my mobile or tablet until they fix the whole audio thing. Meetings I attend dont even have the call in feature to utilize that as an option to listen in. And i can imagine how much extra work that is just to ATTEND a meeting. Citrix, do what you do best...stick to computer software. Maybe apps just isnt your \"thing\".
reviews.author: Correen McQueen

reviews.title: No audio at all
reviews.comment: So I needed this app for a business meeting and I liked how I could click the webex  url in my email and it opens the app, however I could only view the powerpoint presentation.  There was no audio, even the button was grayed out and it said no audio integration for this meeting.. my coworker could hear everything on his PC, another coworker had her tablet and downloaded this app and couldnt hear audio either.  This makes this app totally useless, if I cant hear what our clients are saying then what is the point?
reviews.author: Rokky Medina

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really amazing.
reviews.author: Ramendu Ghosh

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: But I can\'t pass control or change roles on the phone WebEx
reviews.author: Joe Schofield
